mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT F.ID, F.MEMBER_ID, F.FUNDING_TITLE, F.FUNDING_CONTENT, F.FUNDING_IMG_NAME, F.FUNDING_IMG_PATH, F.FUNDING_SUM_COLLECTED, F.FUNDING_TARGET_AMOUNT, F.FUNDING_STATUS, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_PATH FROM TBL_CROWDFUNDING F JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON F.MEMBER_ID = M.ID WHERE FUNDING_STATUS = 'ONGOING' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
